methodology_info.heading: STRATEGY & ARCHITECTURE
methodology_info.description: We develop a one-page business model that captures your vision and goals, and we use it to create a minimum viable product (MVP) that we can immediately start building upon.

methodology_info.heading: DAILY INTERNAL BUILDS
methodology_info.description: Your project manager meets with the team every day to ensure everyone is meeting goals and getting the support they need.

methodology_info.heading: WEEKLY DELIVERABLES
methodology_info.description: The product is in your hands every week. Youâ€™ll be able to use it, provide feedback, and discuss challenges with the team.

methodology_info.heading: MONTHLY DELIVERABLES
methodology_info.description: We keep one eye on the prize, continually working to meet milestones so we can launch the final product on time.

methodology_info.heading: DEDICATED PROJECT MANAGER
methodology_info.description: A dedicated project manager will be responsible for your project who can speak English fluently and have complete technical understanding.

methodology_info.heading: GET WORK DONE
methodology_info.description: As Audacity IT Solutions Limited follow five important methodology, you will not only get your work done on time but also you will save your energy and money.
